name: European Hanfu Association
memberOrga:
UK Han culture association
France Boyan culture assoication
goal: The association aimed to promote Chinese culture and clothes through serials of events. it encourages and teach the European people and Chinese overseas to setup their own local association and organize events across whole Europe and enrich harmony lifestyle.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, International co-operation and development, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
1 setup a forum for people to discuss the culture issue.
2 promote and teach them how to build a successful culture association in local scale.
3 organize events with different countries Chinese culture societies.
